items.name: Building OpenAI with OpenAI
items.summary: At OpenAI, we rely on our own technology to help streamline work, scale expertise, and drive outcomes. In our new series, OpenAI on OpenAI, we share lessons to help other organizations do the same.

items.name: Turning contracts into searchable data at OpenAI
items.summary: OpenAI built a system to extract contract data quickly, cutting turnaround times and making it easier for teams to access the details they need.

items.name: Buy it in ChatGPT: Instant Checkout and the Agentic Commerce Protocol
items.summary: We’re taking first steps toward agentic commerce in ChatGPT with new ways for people, AI agents, and businesses to shop together.
